lead_paragraph: We're asking this question every Monday this summer for our Summer Reading Student Challenge. You can post your answer here anytime until next Monday, August 9.
snippet: We're asking this question every Monday this summer for our New York Times Summer Reading Student Challenge. Students, start your engines!
